He explained on a forthcoming episode of "Oprah Presents Master Class": I asked a very successful guy, "What's the best advice you can give me?' and he said,` Simon Cowell , always know when to leave the fair.' And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever. Microsoft Appoints Satya Nadella as President of Server and Tools Business, Feb. 9, 2011/ PRNewswire/-- Microsoft Corp. today promoted Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services, said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . " Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future
